About
About
Scaling partner and mentor for growth stage startups. Created impact in 50+ startups across key areas of scaling like burn reduction, ops & supply chain design, input tracking & governance, and workforce management. 
10+ years of experience in scaling up internet kitchens, food delivery, fitness, e-commerce and FMCG supply chain. 
Scaling partner and mentor for growth stage startups. Created impact in 50+ startups across key areas of scaling like burn reduction, ops & supply chain design, input tracking & governance, and workforce management. 10+ years of experience in scaling up internet kitchens, food delivery, fitness, e-commerce and FMCG supply chain.
Featured
Featured
Post
Post
Over the last 13 years, Iâ€™ve had a ring side view of the startup ecosystem through my journey helping scale,and 50+ startups as part of. While there are many milestones in a startupâ€™s journey, none come close to the dream of having a successful IPO. Itâ€™s great to see the evolution of the ecosystem to a place where this dream is becoming a real possibility for many startups.

At xto10x, our mission is to help great startups transform product-market fit and initial momentum into world-class, at-scale companies. A crucial milestone in that journey is the transition to the public markets. 75+ startups from the Indian startup ecosystem are planning to do just that in the near future. We feel privileged to be able to play a meaningful role in their journeys through the xto10x IPO Academy â€” the ultimate launchpad for founders aiming to go public in the next two to three years.

This will be a cohort-based program for startup founders who are planning to go public soon and will cover the entire â€œwish-listâ€ of topics to get IPO ready. We have an outstanding star cast of faculty composed of public market investors, industry stalwarts, ex-SEBI officials, i-bankers, founders whoâ€™ve taken their companies public, and more.

Click the link below to register for the curtain-raiser: â€œSetting higher standards to build enduring public companiesâ€ by Mohandas Pai, open to all startup founders and CXOs. This session is scheduled on 13th September in Bangalore.

Post
Post
I wrote a series of posts on 
hashtag
#linkedin a couple of years back on 
#operations excellence topics like control tower, planning, operations design, managing blue collared employees and customer experience. There was a steely resolve to convert these thoughts into a playbook that could be useful for the
ecosystem. I then joined xto10x and as a team we worked with more than 30
companies where we applied these concepts and helped them succeed. We then articulated these into practical frameworks & actionable insights that we believed could help many other startups in their growth phase. This was the genesis of the 10xOps Academy, a 10 week program in Operations Excellence for founders & Ops leaders. Itâ€™s intended to help decode all the necessary capabilities for scaling operations while allowing companies to go deep on 1-2 critical areas - with an objective of helping create a Ops excellence roadmap for the next 18 months.
Was great to see this vision come to life as our first ever batch of
graduated this week. Heartfelt gratitude & congratulations toteams.
As our second batch is set to kickoff next week, Iâ€™m excited about the widespread impact this program can have across the ecosystem.
Congratulations to our Batch-1 graduates!
34
Post
Post
Weâ€™re signing up companies for the second 10x Ops Academy batch thatâ€™s set to start in mid Feb.

Ping me if youâ€™re looking to scale your operations setup - this could be the single most important step you take to setup your operations for success.

Looking forward to 2 months of learning and impact with rockstar founders and ops leaders.
10x Ops Academy | New program launch

I recently completed 2 outstanding years at.

As I reflect - I feel satisfaction & gratitude on one hand, and hunger & belief on the other.

hashtag
#satisfactionabout how I have evolved as an individual - 10x better problem solver, 10x better at conversations, 10x more mindful. Satisfaction that our work during this time has created loads of impact in the
.

towards the entire
ecosystem that has welcomed me and the offerings that I have taken to them. Gratitude towards the entireteam for being great friends & mentors. Gratitude towards my Ops & CX Practice team - who have always been with me through highs of success and the anxiety of creation. Itâ€™s deeply inspiring to be on a team of achievers & well wishers.

to achieve much more individually & as a company - each of the modules we have developed has found relevance in its own big way and thereâ€™s impatience to crack the code on every meaningful problem that startups face during their hyper growth stage.

that we are onto something magical as a company and the only people who can stop us is ourselves if we fall out of the cycle of dreaming, experimenting and making it happen.

We are just getting started.

Iâ€™m just getting started.

We successfully concluded the scaling companies by xto10x program this week under the aegis of MonshaatSA 

Over the last few months, weâ€™ve been engaged with 15 exciting companies fromon different scaling topics like business design, org design and leadership, branding and marketing, operations excellence, and people excellence. It was indeed a great pleasure to see all companies take away value and scaling roadmaps from the program.

On behalf of the entire team at, Iâ€™d like to extend heartfelt gratitude to their excellencies the governor and vice governors offor placing faith in us, andandfor their constant support and collaboration.

A special mention to our partnersfor working hand in hand with us to achieve success in the program.

And finally to entire team atthat worked hard behind the scenes with a single minded mission of creating value for all the scaling companies.

We look forward to creating many more success stories with you all!

Operations Excellence at xto10x
1mo â€¢ 
 1 month ago â€¢ Visible to anyone on or off LinkedIn
Ever wondered how to unlock 5â€“7% CM1 in a D2C business through operations excellence?

Thatâ€™s exactly what we set out to explore in our founders-only roundtables this April and May.

These sessions brought together sharp, curious, and candid founders. The magic? It wasnâ€™t just about learningâ€”it was about collective problem-solving seeded byâ€˜s tested frameworks, real-life case studies, and rich founder experiences. Every question sparked insights. Every challenge turned into a shared opportunity for growth.

We deep-dived into logistics and warehouse costs and levers to control them, the true impact of delivery speed and accurate promise on profitability, the constant trade-off between cost efficiency and customer delight, and in the process we busted myths like â€œfaster = costlierâ€

The outcome? Actionable takeaways, new ways of thinking, and a community of founders helping each other win.

Check out the highlights to see these powerful conversations in action.

Big thanks to all the founders who made these sessions truly special with their openness and insight.

Gagandeep M.
